Key Match Events: Shaheen Shah Afridi was named Player of the Match for his performance of 13* (5) & 3/22.
Barry McCarthy was named Cricinfo's MVP with 97.22 points.
Pakistan won by 3 wickets with 7 balls remaining.
Gareth Delany scored 31 runs off 19 balls for Ireland.
Josh Little remained not out with 22 runs off 18 balls for Ireland.
Shaheen Shah Afridi took 3 wickets for 22 runs.
Imad Wasim took 3 wickets for 8 runs.
Barry McCarthy took 3 wickets for 15 runs.
Babar Azam scored 32 runs off 34 balls for Pakistan.
Shaheen Shah Afridi scored 13* off 5 balls for Pakistan.
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan won the toss and elected to field first.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Central Broward Regional Park Stadium Turf Ground, Lauderhill.
The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024.
Umpires for the match were Chris Gaffaney, Rod Tucker, Sharfuddoula, and Richard Kettleborough.
Pakistan earned 2 points from the match, while Ireland earned 0 points.
